template.name: ADMIN_TABLE
template.description: The beginning of the admin table
template.html: <div class="stand"> <table class="stand" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0">

template.name: ADMIN_ETABLE
template.description: The end of all admin tables

template.name: MAIN_QUICKLOGIN
template.description: Format of the Quick Login box
template.html: {$this->qsf->table} {$this->qsf->lang->main_welcome_guest} {$this->qsf->lang->login_user}:       {$this->qsf->lang->login_pass}:       {$this->qsf->lang->register_reg}        {$this->qsf->lang->login_forgot_pass}   {$this->qsf->etable}

template.name: ADMIN_ADD_TEMPLATE
template.description: Form for adding a new template to a skin
template.html:
{$this->table} {$this->lang->add} {$this->lang->skin_set}
{$this->lang->template_set} {$this->lang->add_in} {$this->lang->or_new} {$this->lang->template_title} {$this->lang->template_name} (Ex. ADMIN_INDEX - MAIN_MESSAGE - etc..) {$this->lang->template_description} {$this->lang->template_html} {$this->etable}

template.name: ADMIN_COPYRIGHT
template.description: Copyright footer for AdminCP
template.html:
{$admin->lang->admin_your_board}
{$admin->name}

{$admin->lang->powered} {$admin->name} [{$admin->version}] © 2006-2007 Roger Libiez
{$admin->lang->based_on} Quicksilver Forums © 2005-2007 The Quicksilver Forums Development Team
Ashlander skin by Roger Libiez
{$time_exec} seconds - {$admin->db->querycount} queries - {$server_load} load

template.name: ADMIN_EDIT_BOARD_SETTINGS
template.description: Form for editing the board settings
template.html:
{$this->table} {$this->lang->settings_general} {$this->lang->settings_site_name} {$this->lang->settings_site_location} {$this->lang->settings_debug_mode} sets['debug_mode']>checked="checked" id="debug2" />
sets['debug_mode']>checked="checked" id="debug1" />   {$this->etable}

{$this->table} {$this->lang->settings_domain} {$this->lang->settings_domain_ns1} {$this->lang->settings_domain_ns2} {$this->lang->settings_domain_master} {$this->lang->settings_domain_ttl}   {$this->etable}

{$this->table} {$this->lang->settings_users} {$this->lang->settings_default_skin} {$this->lang->settings_default_lang}   {$this->etable}

{$this->table} {$this->lang->settings_cookie} {$this->lang->settings_cookie_time}
{$this->lang->seconds} {$this->lang->settings_cookie_prefix} {$this->lang->settings_cookie_path} {$this->lang->settings_cookie_domain} {$this->lang->settings_cookie_secure}
{$this->lang->settings_cookie_secured} sets['cookie_secure']>checked="checked" id="cookie_secure1" />
sets['cookie_secure']>checked="checked" id="cookie_secure2" /> {$this->lang->settings_timezone}   {$this->etable}

{$this->table} {$this->lang->settings_server} {$this->lang->settings_email_reply}
{$this->lang->settings_email_real} {$this->lang->settings_email_smtp} {$this->lang->settings_email_from}
{$this->lang->settings_email_fake} {$this->lang->settings_server_gzip}
{$this->lang->settings_server_gzip_msg} sets['output_buffer']>checked="checked" id="output_buffer1" />
sets['output_buffer']>checked="checked" id="output_buffer2" />   {$this->etable}

template.name: MAIN
template.description: Change the header and footer that will appear on every page
template.html:
debug_mode>
PDNS-Admin Console for {$qsf->sets['site_name']}
{$userheader} {$reminder} {$quicksilverforums} {$copyright}

{$servertime}
{$time_exec} {$qsf->lang->seconds} - {$qsf->db->querycount} {$qsf->lang->main_queries} - {$server_load} {$qsf->lang->main_load} debug_mode && $qsf->perms->auth('is_admin'))> [{$qsf->lang->main_full}]

template.description:
Format the look of the copyright on the board.
